div.p: Curia balliuorum burgy de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvThe 'v' is changed from an 'x'.jo die June anno Domini mmo ccccmo lxxijo

The semyn day henry Wrycht wes adiugyt in' the mercyment of a court for
the wrangwys' entromettyn of iij rachtrys of burdys of Dauid standand
stanys and wrangwys' strybulans in of wordis of the said Dauid

The semyn day maryone alexander mengyhe the wyf of alexander mengyhe wes
adiugyt in the mercyament of a court for the wrang wys' strybulance
of thomas blindseil

Alsua thom blindseil wes adiugyt in the mercyament of a court for the
wrangwys' strybulance of the forsaid maryone

Quo die Ebota filia quondam Johannis roberti in sua pura virginetate
sursum reddidit et resignauit pure et simpliciter totum Jus suum et clameum
quod habet aut habere possit in futurum In et ad illam terram Jacentem in capite
vici Inferioris ecclesie in qua quidem terra quondam Johannis roberti habitauit
dan' et conceden' mariorie neuyson' sorori sue et roberto neuyson' sponso
suo plenariam suam potestatem ad prosequendum dictam terram atque Jus suum
coram preposito et balliuis burgi de abirden que quidem resignacio sasita
fuit per dictam ebotam In manibus Gilberti Waus vnius balliuorum dicti
burgi in pretorio eiusdem pro tribunali sedentis cum omnibus et singulis clausulis
ad legitimos procuratores de necessario requisitis et cetera hiis testibus Willelmo
Wocat Alexandro movat Thoma mar' Alexandro trayle gilberto
lech' Andrea baxstar' Dauid menyes Dauid mar' cum multis aliis

The semyn day Johne' of glenmalyne adiugyt put in til amercyament of a court for
the wrangwys' strybulance of robert of buchane in word and deid and sal
amend tyll hym as law wyll

The forsaid robert wes in the amercyament of a court for the wrangwys'
strybulance of the said Johne' of glenmalyn and sal mend til
hym as cours' of commowne law wyll

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxo die mensis Junij
anno Domini Millisimo quadragintessimo Septuagesimo Secundo

The semyn day Androv mathoson wes adiugyt in thie merciament of a court
for the wrangwys' haldine of half a barrel off small geyr' and sal pay him
within lachfull tyme and day

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio eiusdem per Ricardum prepositum de Kintor' h prepositum
huius burgi xxijo die mensis Junij anno Domini Mmo ccccmo lxxijo et cetera

The semyn day Johne' lytister' the son of adame lyttystar wes adiugyt in amercyament
of a court for the wrangwys' weschine of clath and fylyne of the commowne burne
and sal amend tyll aldirman and bailyeis amer as cours' of commowne law wyll

The actioun mo semyn day it is appoyntyt and acordyt be t assis' be tuex thom gardinar
Wyll clerk on that a part and Wylly sprunt on that othir part that the said Wylly
sprunt sal mak seruice to the said personis for thiis yir' hie haffand the th thrid part of
the hous' al of all prophetis that cumys tharin of bakyne bot quhen that thai bak pyis' and
the said Wylly sprunt haf na wital to lay to thiam hie sal haf his met of thiam that day

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ville xxvij die mensis
Junij anno Domini millissimo quadragintesimo Septuagesimo secundo quo die secte vocateis
et curia affirmata

Eodem die alexander tailyour' adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmj
ratree et emendabit eius prout Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes tailyour' adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
nicholay club et emendabit ac preposito ac balliuis prout iura volunt

Eodem die nicholayus club adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
Johannis tailyour' et emendabit proposito ac balliuis prout Jura volunt

Tercia die mensis Julij valterus thomson receptus fuit
in conburgensem et fratrem gilde pro certa summe pecunie qua fatetur
per communem consilium pro littera mortificacione dominj nostri regis ad hospitalem
sancti thome qua summa Alexander de camera recipit a recardo de
Kyntor preposito et a Dauid colyson' vna balliuorum dicti burgi / nomine
procuratorie dicti Johannis magistri Johannis

Cura balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta per eosdem In pretorio dicti burgj
xvijo die Julij Anno Domini et cetera septuagesimo secundo Quo die curia
affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Johannes grynlaw adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta percussione
et perturbacione Johannis Joly et Mariote Ricarde et emendabit eisdem
prout Jura volunt

Item eodem die Alexander liel conuictus fuit per Assisam honorabilium prouidorumque
virorum ad hoc Juratorum pro iniusta perturbacione georgij fiffe et perse
cucione eiusdem super le forsocht felloune / et emendabit eidem secundum
Juris exigenciam / pro qua perturbacione suprascripta adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie

Eodem die Alexander liel prescriptus Reperiebatur per Assisam ad hoc vt
supra Jurat' quod iniuste perturbauit et inquietauit burgum et ob non
paracionem officiariis eiusdem burgi per Inobedenciam factam officariis
predictis pro quibus quidem precogitata malicia et Inobediencia Inuenit gilber
tum de camera plegium legalem pro eo ad Juri subeundum quoniam et vbicumque
ad id fuerit legitime premunitus coram quocumque Judice competenti pro emenda
et satisfactione de premissis per eundem Juridice faciendis Ac eciam eundem
gilbertum chavmer traxit in plegium legalem quod Georgius fiffe et sibi
Inheren' erunt indempnes et illesi de ipso Alexandro liel et parte
sua ac Inherentibus eidem aliter quam secundum Juris ordinem

Item similiter dictus georgius fiffe Inuenit Johannem vaus Juniorem plegium le
galem pro eo quod Alexander liel suprascriptus et pars sua erunt indempnes
et illesi conseruat' de eodem et parte sua alias secundum secundum Juris ordo
expostulat et requirit

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviijo
die Julij Anno Domini et cetera lxxijo

Eodem die Willelmus Johneson Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
xl s' gilde ad Instanciam comitis de Erol / et soluet xl s' ad communem bursam
preposito / prestito Juramento et cetera

xxix die Julij Jacobus Kennarty adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta capcione vnius salmo
nis ab Emmota filia Willelmi andree scissoris Et Restaurabit eundem salmonem
dicte emmote sine dilacione sicut per assisam ad hoc iuratam deliberatum fuit

the same day the Actione movyt betuix the executouris or Intromettouris
of the gudis and testament of vmquhile Angus lilburne burges of Aberdene
quham god assoilye on the ta part and loyk laris portar of bruges anent
certane gudis clamyt be the said loyk in the name of the forsaid Angus
acht til him as he allegis Is continevit quhil the last day of the said'
moneth quhilk day is assignit be the Aldirman bailyes and consel being
for the tyme to the said executouris til answer' to the said lowyk anent
the said clame as law wil

head.add: An Rede frater gilde vj marcas

div.p:
Eciam eodem die Andreas Rede Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
Ipsius ad hoc magno Interueniente Juramento solito Et soluet vj marcas preposito et cetera

div.head: vltimo die Julij
div.p:
Actio inter lowyk laris et thomam malisson Johannem chapman et Relictam quondam Angusij
lilburne Respectuatur vsque ad diem lune proximo futuro ante merediem statu quo nunc
cum consensu dicti loyk Actoris et Johannis chapman tunc solummodo presentis ex parte altera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
Augusti Anno Domini et cetera lxxijo

Eodem die Robertus club plegius pro Willelmo quelp adiudicatur in amerciamento curie quia
non Intrauit dictum Willelmum prout obligabatur ad istam curiam ad
Juri subeundum pro iniusta perturbacione et lesione Johannis stewart / compar
uit cum dicto Willelmo immediate post scripturam istius act'

Item Willelmus quelp in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis stewart et inobe
diencia Duncani straloch vnius seriandorum in execucione sui officij et e
Istud depositum scribitur in alio latere eiusdem folij et cetera

the said thrid day of August the Assise deliuerit tweching the dettis clamit be
ony man of Angus lilburne that Johne chapman sal pay the thrid parte of the dettis
And marione the spous' of vmquhile Angus lilburne and Thom malisson for
the barnys parte belanging twa barnys sal answere And rychtsa the said Ma
rione sal answere for hir self and for hir twa barnys parte

Item eodem die Johannes stewart adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta pertur
bacione Willelmi quelp verbotenus et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum

Johannes stewart Inuenit Alexandrum howison plegium legalem pro eo quod Willelmus
quelp erit indempnis de eodem alias quam per viam Juris Et econtrario

Idem Willelmus quelp traxit in plegium legalem Willelmum blinschele quod
Johannes stewart prescriptus manebit iniuratus et illesus de ipso Willelmo
nisi prout exigit ordo Juris

Idem Willelmus quelp per bonam et non suspectam assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
regio propter non obedienciam Duncanj'j' overwrites 'o'. straloch seriandj in execucione suj
officij

head.add: nota moricius tailyour et pa tailyour

div.p:
Moricius tailyour et patricius tailyour ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis Donaldi et emendabunt eidem ad visum
proborum et ipsorum quilibet emendabit veluti Jura volunt et videbitur
expedire et cetera

Dauid symson plegius legalis pro dictis Moricio tailyour et patricio fratribus
quod Johannes Donaldi suprascriptus et pars sua erunt indempnes de eisdem et
procuracionibus suis aliter quam per viam Juris

Item excontrario dictus Johannes Donaldi Inuenit Robertum burnat plegium
legalem pro eo quod dicti moricius tailyour et patricius cum eisdem Inherentibus
erunt illesi de ipso Johanne et parte sua aliis quam ordo Juris requirit

Quarto die Augusti anno et cetera lxxijo Antonius scissor adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie propter iniustam perturbacionem Agnetis seruitricis dicti antonij et violentam
percussionem dicte mulieris siue corporis flagellacionem prout coram preposito et balliuis
respondebatur et per eundem Antonium confessis de verberacione eiusdem / et emen
dabit eedem ad visum proborum Et dicta Agnes quita per Asissam ad hoc
Juratam ab omnj perturbacione dicti Antonij Item dictus Antonius dabit
pro emenda dicte Agnetj ij s' Et ad fabricam Sancti Nicholai quoniam onerab
per prepositum sue balliuos v s' pro dimidia libre cere ad chorum et altare eiusdem

Septimo die Augusti Anno et cetera lxxijo Andreas colison sutor adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie per confessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi bertlatson et emendabit
eidem secundum Juris ordinem

Eodem die Robertus cullan deuenit plegius legalis et Willelmo bartlotson et
thomas mar' plegius legalis pro Andrea colison sutore ad Intrandum
dictos Willelmum et Andream coram preposito et balliuis in crastino ante merediem
ad Jua Jura subeundum pro vniuersis contrauersiis et debatis inter eosdem si medio tempore
non appunctuauerint sine concordati fuerint super eisdem

Item Willelmus bartloson per bonam et Assisam Juratam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
pro iniusta perturbacione Andree colison sutoris et emendabit eidem ad visum
proborum

Quo die thomas fiffe plegius pro thoma Johneson de meldrum ad Intrandum
eundem ad diem instantem sepe vocatus et legitime expectatus / non comparuit Quare
precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum ab eodem ad valorem amerciamenti curie et cetera
et hoc tanquam primo die processus

Item Johannes portar sepe vocatus ad Intrandum Johannem Dauison prout obligabatur
et plegius pro eodem deuenit plegalis Non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus
Quare precipitur seriando et cetera

Octauo die Augusti anno et cetera lxxijo Robertus ranyson posuit se in voluntate
ballivorum pro iniusta perturbacione Duncani barry quare adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

Similiter Duncanus barry adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti
Roberti Ranyson et posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro huiusmodi / et emen
dabit dicto Roberto ad visum proborum et cetera

Vndecimo die Augusti Anno Domini et cetera lxxijo Johannes vaus adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie quia non Intrauit le frende theutonicum pro quo deuenit plegius legalis Quare
precipitur seriando et cetera legitima ad hoc vocacione prehabita tanquam primo die huius processus

Item Jacobus craik sepe vocatus ad Intrandum henricum mortimar' pro quo deuenit
plegius legalis non comparuit / quare precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum ab
eodem ad valorem amerciamenti Regii Et quod premuniat eundem et cetera tanquam ad secundum diem
processus

Curia balliuroum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eisudem burgi xiio die
Augusti Anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid tod Reperiebatur per Assisam Juratam quod iniuste perturbauit
Duncanum baxtar pro qua adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabit
eidem prout Jura volunt

Item eodem die Johannes scherel protestabatur quod quicquid Willelmus heres
quondam Jacobi andree / agere sive facere contigerit in aliquibus
punctis suam hereditatem tangentibus dummodo ad etatem venerit legi
timam non preiudicaret sive in dampnum eidem aliquatenus deueniret
aliter quam Juris ordo expostulat et Requirit

Antonius scissor posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro iniusta perturbacione et percussione
Johannis layng pro quibus adiudicatur in amerciamento curie / et emendabit eidem
veluti secundum Juris ordinem videbitur expedire

Item Idem Johannes layng per bonam assisam ad hoc Juratam similiter adiudicatur in
amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti Antonij in verbo tantum et emendabit
eidem ad visum proborum

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos
dicti burgi xviijo die Augusti Anno Domini et cetera lxxijo
Eodem die Johannes malisson adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione

xxvij die Augusti anno et cetera lxxijo Johannes andree le pattynmakar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
per confessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti prat Junioris in verbo / et emendabit
eidem secundum Juris ordinem

Eodem die Johannes andree supra scriptus in plana curia fatebatur se fore debitorem et
debere duas barellas salmonum quondam gilberto de Kyntor et ad satisfaciendum easdem
executoribus dicti gilberti infra terminum Juris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per dictos balliuos vltimo die
mensis Augusti anno Domini et cetera septuagesimo secundo

Quo die Joneta Wricht per bonam assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta pertur
bacione mariorie skipparty et emendabit eedem veluti Jura volunt

Item marioria skipparty in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Jonete voket / et
emendabit eedem ad visum proborum

Elena clerk adiudicatur ut supra in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Mariote
club et emendabit eedem secundum Juris ordinem

Johannes gregory burgensis de Aberdene fecit constituit et ordinauit prouidos viros Wal
terum blinsel thomam prat et Willelmum lowson burgenses dicti burgi et eorum alterum
coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores et deputatos speciales Ad prosequendum et pro Jure
suo protestando coram preposito et ballivis burgi de Aberdene in Curia capitali immediate
post festum Sancti michaelis archangeli proximo futuro de vno annuo Redditu sex
solidorum sibi annuatim debit' de terra Andree cowtis cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico
viridi inter terram Johannis litstar ex parte orientali et communionem viam regiam ex parte occidentali
et cetera et hoc pro tercio die huius processus Et pro huiusmodi annuo Redditu vj s' agend'
et defendend' nomine ipsius constitutis sicut ipse personaliter interesset Ratum et gratum haben' et
habiture et cetera Acta erant hec coram hiis testibus Johanne marr' Dauid colison domino
Johanne de Jaa penitenciario dominj Episcopi Aberdonensis et philippo de Dunbrek seriando
cum diuersis alijs

The secund day of Septembre the yer' et cetera lxxij Anny philp In the tolbuthe
the Aldirman and bailyes sittand in Jugement askit the Aldirman and the bailyes
that thai waulde gif hir licence and fredome togif til Johne of Wellis
hir son state and possessioune of certane landis belanging til hir / and
of certane annualis within the burgh of Aberdene and in the greyn liand
scho Reservande the franktenement til hir awne propir vse for hir
tyme and the said Johne hir son to Remayn in the fee / To the quhilk
peticione at hir desyre the Aldirman and bailyes consentit before the
hail court

The forsaid day the forsaid Johne of Wellis made and ordande Robert
Wormot and Johne Wormot his son coniunctlie and seueraly his verra
procuratouris actouris factouris and speciale deputis for him to defende
baith his landis and annualis / and all vthiris actiones pertenand til
him quhatsumeuir thai be within the burgh of Aberdene he haldand and
fortohaulde ferme and stable et cetera

Item the same day / Cristy / litstar protestit solempnitly in playn court
before the aldirman and bailyes that quhatsumeuir thing the forsaidis
Anny philp and Johne of Wellis hir son had done anent the
lande to the quhilk the said cristy clamyt annualis sulde tur
ne him til na preiudice in tyme tocum anent his Richtis to the
said lande and annuale Rentis

On friday the ferde day of Septembre the yer' et cetera lxxij Adam of craufurde
burges of Aberdene Comperit In the tolbuthe of Aberdene before Johne of
Kyntor and gilbert the vaus / twa of the baillies of the burgh of Aberdene
thai sittand in Jugement / and present and schew ane obligacione be the quhilk he
was bundin til Johne of hyis portar of Rissillis In the Sowme of sex
pund gret xvii s' g' et vj gretis for wad that he had bocht fra the
said Johne of hyis quhilk some' contenit in his oblgiacione the said Adam had
pait til his procuratour Richard of Kyntor / and Ressauit his obligacione fra
the said Richard before thir witnes Richard of Kyntor Aldirman of Aberdene
Johne of mar Johne the vaus Alexander trail Androu murref Johne of
glenmalvin Ranald tailyour' and vthiris sindry

Eodem die Willelmus blinschel filius Alexandri blinschel adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro
iniusta perturbacione mariote sponse Nicholai baxtar / et emendabit eedem
secundum Juris ordinem

Item dicta Mariota similiter per Assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta pertur
bacione dicti Willelmi blinsel et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum

The same day Johne gregory / burges of Aberdene has made and ordanit Richard
of Kyntor Aldirman in the tyme Alexander blinschel and patrik badenach burgess' of the
said burgh and ilkane of thaim coniunctlie and seueralie actouris factouris procura
touris and speciale deputis for him to defende all actiones and causis pretendit or
tobe pretendit proponit or tobe proponit againnis him quhatsumeuir persoune and
specialy in the caus' belanging the sesing state and possessione giffing til Johne
of Wellis of ane annuale of his lande liand in the gallowgat / of the
quhilk annual Johne of Kyntor ane of the baillies of Aberdene has gefin
him sesing vnrychtwisly as he supponis quhilk state the said Johne gre
gory has brokyn and adnullit lachfully within xxiiij houris eftir the said Johne
of Wellis had tayn state and possessione of the said annuale be the forsaid
bailye . he haldand and fortohauld ferme and stable . quhatsumeuir thing the
forsaidis his procuratouris or ony of thaim laghfully ledis tobe done in the
fornemmyt thingis in his name et cetera
